name: CustomerHeader
functionalRequirements:
## Customer Header

### Purpose
Display customer summary information at the top.

### Features
- Customer name and logo
- Key metrics
- Contact info
- Status badges

dataRequirements.description: Displays customer header information passed via props

entities.name: Accounts
entities.usageContext: Customer information displayed in header section

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- customer: Customer entity
- metrics: Key metrics object

properties.name: customer
properties.type: {ID: string, AccountName: string, Industry?: string, Type?: string, Status?: string, Website?: string, Phone?: string, Email?: string}

properties.name: metrics
properties.type: {totalRevenue?: number, openDeals?: number, lifetime?: number, healthScore?: number}
